setattribute.xpath: //trader_item_group[@name='SorceryTrader_Weapons']/item[starts-with(@name, 'spellcast') or starts-with(@name, 'spellTurret') or starts-with(@name, 'staff') or starts-with(@name, 'wand') or starts-with(@name, 'claw') or starts-with(@name, 'dagger') or starts-with(@name, 'polearm') or starts-with(@name, 'scythe') or starts-with(@name, 'sword')]
setattribute.name: quality
